definitions.text: a sharp hand gesture (resembling a blow)
examples: he warned me with a jab with his finger
he made a thrusting motion with his fist

definitions.text: the act of touching someone suddenly with your finger or elbow
examples: she gave me a sharp dig in the ribs
he jabbed his finger into her ribs

definitions.text: strike or punch with quick and short blows

examples: he jabbed the piece of meat with his pocket knife
